:percent.description: The value of the ring progress percentage, which is of numeric type, 0-100
:percent.description_zh: 圆环进度百分比值，为数值类型，0-100

inactive-color.description: The base color of the ring, which is gray by default (this value cannot be changed dynamically)
inactive-color.description_zh: 圆环的底色，默认为灰色(该值无法动态变更)

active-color.description: The color of the active part of the ring (this value cannot be changed dynamically)
active-color.description_zh: 圆环激活部分的颜色(该值无法动态变更)

width.description: The width and height of the entire ring assembly are equal to the width value in rpx by default
width.description_zh: 整个圆环组件的宽度，高度默认等于宽度值，单位rpx

border-width.description: The width of the circle in rpx

duration.description: The time it takes for the entire ring to perform one revolution, in ms
duration.description_zh: 整个圆环执行一圈的时间，单位ms

type.description: If set, the active-color value will be invalidated

bg-color.description: The background color of the entire component is white by default
bg-color.description_zh: 整个组件背景颜色，默认为白色
